channel.title: User-Interface on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in User-Interface on Arrans github.io

item.title: slint-ui/slint
item.description: Slint is an open-source declarative GUI toolkit to build native user interfaces for Rust, C++, JavaScript, or Python apps.

item.title: dotnet/maui
item.description: .NET MAUI is the .NET Multi-platform App UI, a framework for building native device applications spanning mobile, tablet, and desktop.
